content.question: Which of the following most immediately increased enthusiasm in the United States for upholding the freedoms outlined in the excerpt?

choices.label: The passage of a federal law providing veterans with financial aid in housing and education
The successful detonation of an atomic bomb as part of the Manhattan Project
The growing number of women working in defense manufacturing
The attack on the United States at Pearl Harbor

content.answer: The attack on the United States at Pearl Harbor

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
